data.question: What is the chemical formula for 1S·NB?
At what temperature (K) were the crystallographic studies of 1S·NB and 1R·NB conducted?
What is the space group of 1S·CH according to its crystal data?
How does the loading percentage of PP change when 1S·DCM is exposed to PP for 7 days at room temperature?
True or False: The highest ee value observed for 1S·PPex′ was 60%.
What is the effect of increasing the amount of MeOH/H2O from 10 to 50 μL on the ee values for 1S?
data.answer: The ee values remained largely unchanged.

data.question: True or False: The loading of PP decreases as the amount of MeOH/H2O is increased from 10 to 50 μL for 1S.
What is the role of DCM and water/methanol molecules in affecting the shape of the binding sites for PP in 1S?
data.answer: They play an important role in affecting the shape of the binding sites for PP.

data.question: True or False: The crystallographic analysis of 1S·PPex and 1S·PPex′ reveals that DCM and water/methanol molecules profoundly impact the shape of the binding site.
What is the highest ee value reported for any other porous MOM according to the study?
True or False: The ee values for 1S·DCM and 1R·DCM soaked in racemic PP for 7 days were higher than those exposed for shorter time periods.
What happens to the loading of PP when the resolution of PP is conducted at 40 °C for 1S·DCM?
data.answer: The loading of PP starts to decrease after only 3 days.

data.question: True or False: The loading of PP decreases when the resolution of PP is conducted at 40 °C for 1S·DCM.
What is the effect of 200 μL of 90% MeOH/H2O on the ee value for 1S?
data.answer: It increases the ee value to 60%.

data.question: True or False: The loading of PP is only 33% when 200 μL of 90% MeOH/H2O is used for 1S.
What is the crystal system of 1S·PPex according to its crystal data?
How does the presence of DCM and water/methanol molecules affect the orientation of the third PP molecule in 1S·PPex and 1S·PPex′?
data.answer: They cause the third PP molecule to have different orientations in 1S·PPex and 1S·PPex′.

data.question: True or False: The third PP molecule is resolved as the R enantiomer in 1S·PPex.
What is the maximum ee value according to the crystal structure for 1S·PPex?
True or False: The ee value for 1S·PPex′ according to HPLC analysis is lower than expected from crystallographic analysis.
